activities:
SurveyMonkey Inc. collects, stores and processes personal data from users, survey panel members and other survey respondents within Switzerland to provide those users and other customers with a variety of personalized products and services primarily related to online surveys.  This includes the transfer of customer personal data from EU SurveyMonkey subsidiaries to SurveyMonkey Inc. located in the United States.  

SurveyMonkey has multiple privacy policies and privacy statements covering its various products and services.
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data:  TRUSTe (EU Safe Harbor Program)
